channel.title: Python on Lin's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Python on Lin's Blog

item.title: MLB playoff prediction with SVM & Randomforest
item.description: In the same theme,MLB. I will show how to use Python to train a randomforest and SVM classifier. Our target is predicting whether the team will enter the next year playoff or not. Since the playoff qualification depends on the same year’s season game win rate. If we predict the same year playoff is pointless. So I make the variable “palyoff” to “next year playoff”. I will use the module

item.title: Using pandas to craw MLB team data
item.description: MLB 球隊資料 爬蟲 這次參與工研院資料科學的課程，課程中分配的小組必須進行一個完整資料分析的報告，題目自訂。 因為球類的open data相對完整，基
